casebody.data:
STATE OF CONNECTICUT v. JERMAIN LITTLE (14108)

O’Connell, Landau and Heiman, Js.

Argued October 25 decision released November 21, 1995 Barry A. Butler, assistant public defender, for the appellant (defendant) Richard F. Jacobson, assistant state’s attorney, with whom, on the brief, were Donald A. Browne, state’s attorney, and John Blawie, assistant state’s attorney, for the appellee (state). PER CURIAM.

This case is controlled by State v. Groomes, 232 Conn. 455, 656 A.2d 649 (1995).

The judgment is affirmed.
